item.title: Post Bud - The Higher Post
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:1135, topic:257270”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=339681.msg4495270#msg4495270 date=1441664609]
I ended up just taking one tab and found another friend to join me. We went into a field, played some music and looked at the clouds and trees, smoked a blunt, ate some food just walked around the woods. It was easily my most relaxing trip… just breathing in the air while staring at the sky felt fantastic. If you haven’t done LSD before I do recommend it… although who here has done shrooms? I’ve been trying to get my hands on them, but they’re only pop up so often where I am.
[/quote]I haven’t done shrooms, but I’ve heard the trip is vastly different. I usually hear two different opinions on comparing LCD to shrooms. I’ve talked to people who would love LCD but hate shrooms, and vice versa… It really depends just how your own body reacts. I would NOT waste your money on shrooms if you get them from a secondary-secondary source (your guy knows a guy - type deal). I’d only buy shrooms if you know they are legit, mushrooms. Some of the strands are grown very poorly and cause you to get very sick, so be careful.

I actually came to this thread, because I’ve recently moved to a new city and know absolutely no one who smokes weed. I live in Tennessee (in the states) and drugs and pot are not openly talked about unless it’s with people my own age. It’s really hard to find people to even talk about smoking pot.

So my question is, have you guys moved to a new city where you knew no one to buy weed from? What did you do to find weed to buy? I’m not desperate, but it would be nice to have/find someone to buy from. No one at my current job smokes weed, so that sucks :(.[/quote]

I don’t have experience, but I’d look for smokers. If there’s a college campus nearby, find where people smoke cigarettes and ask around

Read full topic

I usually hear two different opinions on comparing LCD to shrooms. I’ve talked to people who would love LCD but hate shrooms, and vice versa… It really depends just how your own body reacts. I would NOT waste your money on shrooms if you get them from a secondary-secondary source (your guy knows a guy - type deal). I’d only buy shrooms if you know they are legit, mushrooms. Some of the strands are grown very poorly and cause you to get very sick, so be careful.

I actually came to this thread, because I’ve recently moved to a new city and know absolutely no one who smokes weed. I live in Tennessee (in the states) and drugs and pot are not openly talked about unless it’s with people my own age. It’s really hard to find people to even talk about smoking pot.

So my question is, have you guys moved to a new city where you knew no one to buy weed from? What did you do to find weed to buy? I’m not desperate, but it would be nice to have/find someone to buy from. No one at my current job smokes weed, so that sucks :(.

item.title: Post Bud - The Higher Post
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Just make sure your setting is good, surrounded by good people. Be happy! Have some good tunes lined up, maybe a dark room with some black lights 'n doodads hanging up on the walls. You’ll need a couple hours to not need to do anything, just chill. Maybe order a pizza a little bit into your trip.

Given that you actually got acid…

Read full topic

item.title: Post Bud - The Higher Post
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:1129, topic:257270”]Not bud related but…

So tomorrow I’m gonna try two tabs of acid. I’ve done one tab the two other times I tried it (120µg each), and I want to know what to expect. I’ve done research on other sites but does anyone have experience with two or more tabs? I’ve heard shit get’s pretty crazy and honestly, as much as I enjoyed both of my previous experiences, one tab was just an absurd time. Any tips/experiences?[/quote]

Don’t overthink it and go with the flow.

I’m not much of a man for acid but I regularly (3 out of 4 weekends) take Ecstasy/MDMA and that’s the best advice I can give to anyone on anything, just chill out and go with it.

Personally I wouldn’t double drop but if you want to then who am I to warn you otherwise!

Read full topic

item.title: Post Bud - The Higher Post
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:1129, topic:257270”]Not bud related but…

So tomorrow I’m gonna try two tabs of acid. I’ve done one tab the two other times I tried it (120µg each), and I want to know what to expect. I’ve done research on other sites but does anyone have experience with two or more tabs? I’ve heard shit get’s pretty crazy and honestly, as much as I enjoyed both of my previous experiences, one tab was just an absurd time. Any tips/experiences?[/quote]You will have a great time! Be in a positive environment, like don’t be at a party or anything that can cause a bad trip. It’s hard to have a bad trip unless you sike yourself out.

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Went to a local dispensary the other day.
Got a half ounce for $60 (plus tax) and a free cookie.
Though, I was confused when they gave me two tall pill bottles instead of a sealed bag (Another dispensary does that) or just one large bottle (They definitely make them). I swear I’m gonna have more of the bottles than weed.

(Warning, both images are large)
[spoiler]

FafDqBT.jpg1936×2592

Note: that card pictured is a gift card (that has 1 cent on it last I checked). So no, I’m not worried about you guys seeing it.[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Dat purple]

[/spoiler]

item.title: Post Bud - The Higher Post
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:1115, topic:257270”]Reviving this for a few weeks.

Alright, so i’m getting a G-Pen in a week or so. My co-worker brought in her vape pen last night , an odd but good coffee oil flavor. I’m leaning towards wax and oils for now, eventually dry herbs in the future. What are your guys favorite waxes/oils? I tried dabs for the first time last month and it was great.[/quote]

I currently have acid kush honey oil. It seems to give a more powerful high than the usual. I will likely be getting a gpen for oils, wish I could try it first though. Currently I like to just put some on top of a bowl of weed though. First few hits are heaven.

I don’t know the strain of my current weed but its potent, it has lasted me weeks.

Read full topic
